name: Worlds Within Worlds
description:
Download the EXE for:

  • Save / Load (The game will remember the Leaves you collected, Loading is automatic)
  • Fullscreen (Toggle Fullscreen: F4)
  • Improved graphics: Everything gets a nice drop-shadow

Made for TO Jam 2021. Collect Golden Leaves in to restore Trees in this retro platformer.

Music by Mark Sparling from the Album "Daily Songs Vol. 45 (March 2020)", used with permission.

Tracks Used (In order of occurrence):

  • Daily March 7 2020 #1330 (LSDJ + Piano) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 1 2020 #1324 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 5 2020 #1328 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
Controls:
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Jump: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Pause: Escape / Start 
    • Adjust Music / SFX Volume from the Pause Menu
  • Restart: R
  • Toggle Fullscreen: F4
  • Supports Gamepad!
    • You can set Gamepad to Ignore from the Start Menu

Art + Engine built ahead of time. Levels made in 9.5 hours for Jam.

Change Log:
  • v0.2:
    • Fixed Default Audio levels (because that's always a problem for me)
    • Modified Jellies level
